font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 纠正：to free from error, fallacy, or misconception
【例】 disabuse sb. of the notion打算 that…
【例】I must disabuse you of your feelings of grandeur高贵
【近】 disenchant, undeceive
【反】 lead into error 导致错误；mislead 误导
【记】 dis+ abuse 滥用,误用→解除错误
